Nourish 3 [i](When this creature enters, put three +1/+1 counters on it or create three colorless Food artifact tokens with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.”)[/i]
Whenever an artifact you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, target opponent loses life equal to Meatery Master’s power.
